modName: Patch - Starting Spell Choice and Live Another Life
summary: Just a small patch to bring Starting Spell Choice by AliTheLord back in compatibility with the latest version (2.4 and up) of Alternate Start - Live Another Life by Arthmoor.
descriptionHtml:
This patch is to bring [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10254/]Starting Spell Choice[/url] by AliTheLord back in compatibility with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9557/]Alternate Start - Live Another Life[/url] by Arthmoor.
As such, it (obviously) REQUIRES both files.

----

[b]What Does This [s]Mod[/s] Patch Do?[/b]

All I did was go into the CK and plop in a duplicate of the apothecary's satchel container and put the five spell choice scrolls (Alteration, Conjuration, Destruction, Illusion, Restoration Memories) in its inventory, non-respawning, and placed the thing in the starting cell used by Live Another Life.

[u]In summation:[/u] On the table in the prison cell is a "Battered Satchel." Inside are the memory scrolls-- only one of each, and only available to be taken once.

----

[b]Why Did I Make This?[/b]

When Arthmoor updated LAL to version 2.4.0, he moved the start from a free-floating prison cell (where character creation and new life choice happened) to an in-world prison cell in the Abandoned Prison. The compatibility patch AliTheLord had made for their two mods (putting the "memories" scrolls for spell choice in the inventory of the skeleton in the original cell) was thusly rendered ineffective. After inquiring with AliTheLord if s/he intended to update and receiving no answer, I have decided to release the modification to the patch. (I do hope I am not stepping on any toes.)

----

[b]Installation Instructions:[/b]

1) Download and activate with mod manager, ensuring this patch is loaded BELOW/AFTER both Alternate Start and Starting Spell Choice.

OR

2) Download manually and pop it into the same folder as your Skyrim.exe. (I think that's all there is to that, right?)
author: lindenlaurel
